title: Creating a website with {distill}
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.

title: My very first blog post
contents:
Photo by SpaceX on UnsplashThere is nothing of real interest here. This post only exists as a test of the {distill} package’s blog features as well as, more importantly, my ability to use them.
Take-off!
